+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
| |fig1| Save model              | |fig2| Load model               |
+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
| |fig3| Compute gravity anomaly | |fig4| Compute magnetic anomaly |
+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
| |fig5| Capture Coordinates     | |fig6| Start fault picking      |
+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
| |fig7| Increase aspect         | |fig8| Decrease aspect          |
+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
| |fig9| Increase aspect x2      | |fig10| Decrease aspect x2      |
+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
| |fig11| Zoom in                | |fig12| Zoom out                |
+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
| |fig13| Full extent            | |fig14| Pan                     |
+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
| |fig15| Segy gain up           | |fig16| Segy gain down          |
+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
| |fig17| Transparency increase  | |fig18| Transparency decrease   |
+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
| |fig19| Load well data         |                                 |
+--------------------------------+---------------------------------+
